title: Divya Tejas: Diamond-Studded Addigai Pendant
materials: 22K Gold (Suddha Bangaram) meticulously crafted with brilliant-cut Diamonds. The gold features a lustrous Hyderabadi polish
features: This exquisitely designed pendant embodies the classic Addigai style, featuring intricate filigree work and a delicate floral motif studded with sparkling diamonds. The graceful arrangement of the gold beads evokes traditional South Indian elegance.
colors: Radiant Gold with the dazzling brilliance of white diamonds. A timeless and sophisticated color combination.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Vivahaalu)
and formal gatherings. Its versatile design also allows for elegant everyday wear.
description: This Addigai pendant is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of pure gold and shimmering diamonds represents prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom piece. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while its eye-catching beauty will undoubtedly turn heads.
